name: Lightspeed
title: Solanas Money Makers
text:
Synopsis
Solana's crypto ecosystem experienced significant growth in 2024, driven primarily by memecoin trading and high-fee protocols, with Raydium leading the pack at $648 million in fees.

Key Insights
- Top Solana protocols by fees in 2024 demonstrate strong market activity, particularly in memecoin trading
- Raydium (DEX) generated $648 million in fees, benefiting from memecoin speculation
- Jito earned $633 million through MEV (Maximal Extractable Value) tips, highlighting blockchain transaction efficiency
- Pump.fun, a memecoin launch pad, generated $308 million in fees in less than a year
- Emerging platforms like Photon and Telegram trading bots (Trojan, BONKbot) gained significant traction
- Kamino, a DeFi protocol, grew to over $2 billion in Total Value Locked (TVL) in 2024
- The Solana ecosystem shows strong speculative trading activity, particularly around memecoins and quick-trade platforms
